title: Greetly’s Visitor Management System
description: Greetly’s Visitor Management System is a comprehensive solution to elicit a great visitor experience while following business policies, regardless of organization, facility type, geography, or industry. Our highly customizable interface and user-friendly software can do much more than collect names! Greetly’s software is a revolutionary set of tools offering more effective physical and data security, internal and regulatory compliance maintenance, providing legal documentation, ID cards, badges, and keycards, in addition to basic visitor activity tracking.
